game.name: KAL
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: KAL은 Reunion 섬의 전설 “Gran-Mèr Kal”에서 영감을 받은 심리 공포 게임입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: KAL is a first-person psychological horror game. Trapped in an old, abandoned Creole house, immerse yourself in a time loop and relive the story of a slave who became a true legend.
